Key Skills: HTML5 , CSS3 , JavaScript , Angular , Python , Ruby , Java , NET , MySQL , MongoDB , PostgreSQL , Git , AWS , Azure , Docker , Kubernetes , React , Vuejs , Nodejs , Google Cloud
Description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Full Stack Software Developer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining software applications from start to finish. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end development, as well as a passion for creating innovative and user-friendly software solutions.

Responsibilities:
 Develop and maintain software applications using modern front-end and back-end technologies.
 Collaborate with designers, developers, and stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical specifications and user stories.
 Design and implement responsive and visually appealing user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
 Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code in languages such as JavaScript (Node.js), Python, Ruby, Java, or .NET for back-end development.
 Implement and maintain databases, APIs, and. server-side logic to support software applications.
 Ensure the scalability, security, and performance of software applications through proper architecture design and optimization techniques.
 Conduct thorough testing and debugging of software applications to identify and resolve issues and ensure quality assurance.
 Stay updated on emerging technologies, industry trends, and best practices in software development and apply them to enhance project outcomes.
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to brainstorm ideas, solve problems, and drive innovation in software development projects.

Requirements:
 Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
 Proven experience as a Full Stack Software Developer or similar role, with a portfolio of completed projects.
 Strong proficiency in front-end technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and modern JavaScript frameworks/libraries (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js).
 Solid understanding of back-end development technologies and frameworks (e.g., Node.js, Express.js, Django, Flask, Ruby on Rails, Spring Boot, .NET).
 Experience with database management systems such as MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, or similar.
 Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and CI/CD pipelines.
 Knowledge of cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus.
 Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work independently or as part of a team.
 Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.

Benefits:
 Competitive salary and benefits package.
 Opportunities for professional development and career growth.
 Collaborative and innovative work environment.
 Flexible work arrangements and work-life balance.
 Access to cutting-edge technologies and tools to support your work.

Job Type: Full-time


Education:
 Bachelor's (Required)

Experience:
 Front-end development: 1 year (Required)
 total work: 3 years (Required)
 Java: 1 year (Required)
 Back-end development: 1 year (Required)

Work Location: In person,

Key Skills: Python , Django , PostgreSQL , MySQL , SQLite , HTML , CSS , JavaScript , Angular , Git , Nginx , AWS , Heroku , Docker , RESTful APIs , Testing , Celery , Redis , Memcached , React , Vuejs , Gunicorn , DigitalOcean , GraphQL , Security Practices , pytest
Description:
Company Description

Chikitsa.io is a Web 3.0 secure, cloud-based smart HIMS solution based in Jaipur. Our platform offers innovative E-Prescription modules, real-time insights into hospital operations, a patient-centric mobile application, and ABHA Compliant HMIS for seamless insurance claim settlement. We focus on digitalizing end-to-end hospital operations while maintaining familiarity for healthcare providers and ensuring coordinated patient care.

Role Description

This is a full-time on-site role for a Django Developer at Chikitsa.io in Jaipur. The Django Developer will be responsible for back-end web development, software development, front-end development, programming, and working with databases. The role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to enhance the platform's functionalities and user experience.

Qualifications
 Back-End Web Development and Software Development skills
 Front-End Development and Programming skills
 Experience with databases
 Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities
 Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

Technical Skills:

Proficiency in Python:
 Django is a Python framework, so a deep understanding of Python is essential, including object-oriented programming (OOP), data structures, and algorithms.

Django Framework:
 Understanding of Django's core features like Models, Views, Templates (MVT architecture), ORM, middleware, and forms.
 Familiarity with Django Rest Framework (DRF) for building APIs.
 Experience with Djangos authentication and authorization systems.

Database Management:
 Working knowledge of relational databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite.
 Experience in writing complex SQL queries and using Django ORM to interact with databases.

Frontend Development:
 Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to integrate with Django templates.
 Familiarity with frontend frameworks like React, Vue.js, or Angular (optional but useful for building more dynamic web apps).

Version Control (Git):
 Understanding Git for source code management, collaborating with teams, and versioning applications.

Deployment & DevOps:
 Experience with web servers (e.g., Nginx, Gunicorn) and deploying Django applications to cloud platforms like AWS, DigitalOcean, or Heroku.
 Knowledge of Docker and containerization is a plus.

APIs & Web Services:
 Experience in building and consuming RESTful APIs.
 Understanding of GraphQL (optional).

Security Practices:
 Familiarity with security measures in Django (e.g., preventing XSS, CSRF, and SQL injection).
 Understanding Djangos security features like user authentication, SSL/TLS, and session management.

Testing:
 Knowledge of testing frameworks in Django such as pytest or Djangos own testing tools to ensure code reliability.

Asynchronous Processing:
 Familiarity with asynchronous task queues like Celery for handling background tasks.

Caching:
 Experience with caching mechanisms (Redis, Memcached) to improve performance.,

Description:
Senior Full Stack Software Engineer

Role Category: Programming & Design

Role: Full Stack Software Engineer

Job Location: Jaipur

Work Mode: WFO

Position Overview


Key Responsibilities
 Transform Strategy into Action: Develop, pilot, and iterate on new product implementations for both new and existing customers, translating product vision into technical strategy.
 Collaborate & Own: Work closely with cross-functional teams, serving as a technical lead to achieve business-critical goals.
 Champion Agile Practices: Lead end-to-end software development in an agile setting, working across our full tech stack.
 Drive Quality & Efficiency: Become proficient with our testing, deployment, observability, and monitoring tools, recommending improvements and mentoring others to foster a quality-driven culture.
 Mentor & Simplify: Guide teammates and promote simple, effective solutions for complex problems across our teams and products as we scale.

About You
 Experienced: 5+ years in software engineering, ideally with experience in customer-facing product development.
 Frontend Expert: Strong proficiency in React, TypeScript, NodeJS, and Redux, with a solid understanding of CSS, component libraries, and design systems.
 Backend Capable: Experienced in building RESTful APIs and backend systems (Python/Django experience is a plus, though any backend expertise is valued).
 Adaptable: Able to thrive in a fast-paced, startup environment with multiple concurrent projects.
 Proactive Leader: Driven by a strong bias for action, ensuring projects move forward efficiently and produce measurable results.,
